rows.label: qev075201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh ho! It's the mighty warrior from before!
I thought fate might see fit to cross our paths again,
and here we are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Shall we celebrate this happy accident with a quick
round of sparring?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0011
rows.name: Fall into a combat stance and nod grimly.

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0021
rows.name:
Explain to Gi Zang that fighting within
the city limits is frowned upon.

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0003
rows.name: Ah ha ha! You are truly a wonder, my friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0004
rows.name:
However, the last time I started fighting in the streets,
I received a severe tongue-lashing from the humans.
Some weak-livered hand-wringing about public safety...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0005
rows.name: How does Noctilum strike you as a backdrop instead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Ah, yes. In fact, the other day I received a severe
tongue-lashing from the humans about just this.
Some weak-livered hand-wringing about public safety...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0007
rows.name:
But I do not wish to make trouble for your kind,
so thank you for reminding me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0008
rows.name: What say you to Noctilum as a backdrop, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0009
rows.name:
It's a perfect spot to apply some of the classic Hundred
Hellions guerrilla-warfare tactics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0010
rows.name:
This will be a different match than our last,
I assure you. So then? Shall we battle?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0011
rows.name: I knew you would say that. How amusing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0012
rows.name:
I've only crossed blades with you once before,
but we already feel like old companions of war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod at Gi Zang's assessment.

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang that you don't feel any special connection.

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0013
rows.name:
My master always said that if I truly wanted to grow,
I must find a rival who could be both my closest friend
and strongest enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0014
rows.name: I wager that he had someone like you in mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0015
rows.name:
Got your guard up already? Heh. I've never been good
at that kind of mental game. My master always
chastised me for revealing my heart to my foes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0016
rows.name: I imagine there is much you could teach me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0017
rows.name:
I shall go ahead to the entrance of Noctilum.
When you are ready, meet me at the bridge
that is known as the Elephant's Trunk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Not bad. I was camouflaged with the forest most
thoroughly, and yet you spotted me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0019
rows.name:
If sneak attacks are out, there is nothing left but a
head-on showdown.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0020
rows.name:
You find me here as well?
You are a tough one to fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0021
rows.name: You make this fun, though. Let us continue![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Enough. You've made it clear that clever tricks won't
get me anywhere with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0023
rows.name:
No more guerrilla tactics from this point forward.
Now we fight face-to-face as warriors![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0024
rows.name:
I am Gi Zang, last survivor of the Hundred Hellions
and inheritor of my master's sword. I draw it nâ€”OW!
...Dammith. I bith my tongth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0050
rows.name: Urge

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang to try his line again.

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0060
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0061
rows.name: Begin the fight as if nothing happened.

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Y-yeath, thath didn't counth! *ahem*
I am Gi Zangth, lasth thurvivor of the Hundr...
DAMMITH! It'sth all schwollen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0026
rows.name:
One momenth... Bluuuuurrrrrrrgh!
...Good grief, that really stings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0027
rows.name:
My grandfather always said a warrior needs to
introduce himself before fighting a duel, so I've
practiced that line over and over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0028
rows.name:
But such formal odes have always come hard to me.
Let us just have a good fight, shall we? Here we go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0029
rows.name: Owwww. Goodness, that really stings...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0030
rows.name:
My grandfather always said a warrior needs to
introduce himself before fighting a duel, so I've
practiced that line over and over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0031
rows.name:
Many thanks for letting my lack of decorum go.
Let us just have a good fight, shall we? Here we go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0032
rows.name: Oof... You are stronger than the last time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0033
rows.name:
If anything, I feel as if there's even MORE distance
between us now. My grandfather would be ashamed,
were he around to see it. I must work harder![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0070
rows.name: Ask about Relations

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0071
rows.name: Inquire about Zang's grandfather.

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0080
rows.name: Ask about Strength

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0081
rows.name: Find out why Zang seeks to become more powerful.

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0034
rows.name:
He fought back a Prone force two hundred deep single-
handed. He was the hero of the Hundred Hellions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0035
rows.name:
I was an orphan of war, but he took me in and raised
me as his own, grooming me to be his successor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0036
rows.name:
He was a stern and unforgiving man. If ever I begged
off in practice, he would throw me down a waterfall
without batting an eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0037
rows.name:
But on days I truly pushed myself to my limits,
he would prepare his famous ytarashroom stew and
regale me with stories of battles past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0038
rows.name: Ah, memories... That stew was divine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0039
rows.name: A shame I won't get the chance to taste it again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0090
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0091
rows.name:
Ask Gi Zang why he can't eat
more of his grandfather's stew.

rows.label: qev075201_JNK0100
rows.name: Deflect[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_SEL0101
rows.name: Change the topic by asking where Gi Zang grew up.

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0040
rows.name:
The rest of the Hundred Hellions have moved on from
this life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0041
rows.name:
Our strength existed solely to preserve the kingdom.
That was our creed and we held to it, fighting the
Ganglion even after we Wrothians bent the knee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0042
rows.name:
They burned our forest. Our houses. Our families...
I was the only one who survived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0043
rows.name:
My grandfather also achieved the honorable end of a
true warrior. With his dying breath, he bade me use
his sword to save the Wrothian people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0044
rows.name:
I did not have the chance to die with the rest of them,
for Prince Jiarg forbade it. Instead I lived and became
a pawn of the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0045
rows.name:
I will never suffer that humiliation again.
This time I shall avenge my friends, whatever the cost![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0046
rows.name:
And for that, I need strength enough to stand unbowed
against anyone. Then I can go on living...for them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0047
rows.name:
So that I might kill every last one of the dastards who
wiped out the Hundred Hellions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0048
rows.name:
Everyone in the hidden village fought back against the
Ganglion to the bitter end. Even after the Wrothians
bent the knee, we fought on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0049
rows.name:
They burned our forest. Our houses. Our families...
I was the only one who survived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0050
rows.name:
My grandfather also achieved the honorable end of a
true warrior. With his dying breath, he bade me use
his sword to save the Wrothian people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0051
rows.name:
I did not have the chance to die with the rest of them,
for Prince Jiarg forbade it. Instead I lived and became
a pawn of the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0052
rows.name:
I will never suffer that humiliation again.
This time I shall avenge my friends, whatever the cost![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0053
rows.name:
And for that, I need strength enough to stand unbowed
against anyone. Then I can go on living...for them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0054
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I hope we might spar again sometime.
...Here. This is for going to the trouble of coming all
the way out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0055
rows.name:
...And for listening. It feels good to share some of the
burdens which lie heavy on my heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075201_MSG0056
rows.name: Until we meet again, my friend![ST:wait ]
